data.name: CivilContract
data.detailed_description:
• When will the game be out? CivilContract has no locked in date but we are currently on schedule for early 2019.

  • What is CivilContract? CivilContract is a Modern-themed roleplay-adventure game set in the vast open world environment of Australia. The game focuses mainly on the player. Creating an environment that feels alive and is constantly moving. For those players who choose the crime side of life, there will be consequences for their actions if they get caught that is.

  • How long will jail times go for? The player will only be able to be in jail for a maximum of 30 minutes this is only for really bad crimes such as killing an LEO (Law Enforcement Officer)

  • Who is developing the game? A small team of 3 at the moment and we hope to get more devs in the future but we need to find the right people which can take a bit.

  • How do you become a cop? Their will be a NPC inside the police station front lobby you will be able to speak to they will ask you if you want to start the test to become a law enforcement officer only players with more than 24 hours on the game will be able to do the test if you pass the test you will be able to start the tutorial on how to be a good police officer than you will be able to start your shift as your first rank Probationary Constable.

  • Do I get the full game as well if you buy early access? Yes anyone who buys early access will receive 1x full version of the game 1 day early before public release.

  • How many players will be on each server? 64 players.

  • Will there be any servers in other countries? Their will be EU and AU servers on early access but we hope that on full release we will have a option for NA servers.

  • How do we know this is not a scam like other games? We release screenshots of our development all the time and we do development streams of us actually in the game working on buildings vehicles player models and much more so this gives our followers more trust as they can actually see the game as we working on it in our streams.

    Early Access

    What will there be?
    • Firearms: Pistol 9mm, Assault Rifle, Pump Shotgun - Adjustable stock, sight, mag, grip, suppressor
    • Jobs: Law Enforcement, Firefighter, Criminal, Shop Owner - Run Your Own Business,
    • Things to do: Rob the Police Station Armoury, Rob other players, Start your own store, Get a job, Buy a house and add furniture to it, Socialize with other players, Become a drug dealer, Go to prison, Start a prison riot, As you can see there is an endless list of things to do within our advanced early access town.

data.short_description: Civil Contract is a modern themed role-play adventure game set in the vast open world environment of Australia. The game focuses mainly on the player, creating an environment that feels alive and that is constantly moving.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-Bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1060 GTX
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
